scripts.setup: npm install && jspm install npm:single-spa && jspm install npm:single-spa-angular1 && jspm install npm:single-spa-jspm && jspm install --unlink && npm run setup-apps && npm run setup-menu
scripts.setup-apps: find ./apps -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd $0 && npm run setup'
scripts.setup-menu: cd menu && jspm link npm:single-spa-examples-menu@latest -y && cd .. && jspm install npm:single-spa-examples-menu@latest --link -y && cp -R -L jspm_packages/npm/single-spa-examples-menu@latest . && rm -r jspm_packages/npm/single-spa-examples-menu@latest && mv ./single-spa-examples-menu@latest ./jspm_packages/npm/
scripts.prepare-surge: npm run setup && find ./apps -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd $0 && npm run prepare-surge' && npm run bundle && npm run setup-menu
scripts.linkSingleSpa: cd ../single-spa && npm run build && jspm link npm:single-spa@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaJspm: cd ../single-spa-jspm && jspm link npm:single-spa-jspm@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-jspm@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaAngular1: cd ../single-spa-angular1 && jspm link npm:single-spa-angular1@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-angular1@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaGlobals: cd ../single-spa-globals && npm run build && jspm link npm:single-spa-globals@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-globals@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaReact: cd ../single-spa-react && npm run build && jspm link npm:single-spa-react@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-react@latest --link
